text: well I got on Monday after my husband
died there wasn't enough food my son and
I had just one meal a day we've suffered
so much so we decided to escape our
country thinking we would find peace
elsewhere when I was on board 400 of us
were crammed onto the boat the food and
water quickly ran out the propeller was
broken and there was no fuel for the
engine then the smugglers abandoned us
we were left floating at sea we had
nothing to eat whenever there was a
passing fishing boat people swam to ask
for help
some of them drowned I didn't want to
leave my country but it was in turmoil
wherever we go we find no peace many
children died during the journey I was
scared my son would die too for months
at sea we feared we would never reach
land again
no country wanted us we won't allow to
dock
even when our boat was sinking one day I
saw helicopters and planes I was so
happy I thought they were coming to
rescue us but they never did
when arraigned we were drenched and when
the Sun rose we roasted I'm still scared
now I don't know what would happen to us
I left my country to avoid persecution
but here it is also difficult I pray
that people will come to help us
